product_name: Sea to Summit Citronella Wilderness Wash Soap - 1.3 fl. oz.
long_description: Sea To Summit Citronella Wilderness Wash soap is gentle on skin and fabrics but tough enough for dirty dishes and laundry stains. Contains citronella and sandalwood essential oils for a subtle fresh scent; oils help deter bugs without the use of harsh chemicals. Can be used for bathing and washing fabrics, dishes and outdoor gear. Citronella wash is biodegradable and paraben free. Small 1.3 fl. oz. bottle travels easily and meets airport regulations for carry-on liquids; tough bottle won't break or leak. Use Sea To Summit Citronella Wilderness Wash soap sparingly; concentrated formula requires only a small amount for each use.
short_description: Sea To Summit Citronella Wilderness Wash soap is gentle on skin and fabrics but tough enough for dirty dishes and laundry stains.
